content: no-sew rhinoceros no-sew rhinoceros ©2016 primarily patterns 1 notes ● worked in the round do not join rounds ● total stitches in the round are given in parentheses ● finished size approximately 3 long body materials & tools 15 yards gray worsted weight yarn worked from nose 1 pair 6mm black safety eyes round 1 chain 4 2 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook single_crochet in nxt chain 4 single_crochet in stuffing last chain single_crochet in opposite side of middle chain 2 single_crochet in 1st chain 10 3 5mm e crochet hook round 2 3 single_crochet big horn single_crochet in same st 7 single_crochet 11 abbreviations us notation chain = chain round 3 single_crochet in each st around 11 double_crochet = double_crochet round 4 3 single_crochet small horn 8 single_crochet 11 decrease = decrease round 5 increase single_crochet decrease single_crochet increase 5 single_crochet 12 half_double_crochet = half-double_crochet work one extra single_crochet treat this as new end of round increase = increase lp = loop round 6 2 single_crochet ear single_crochet increase single_crochet ear 2 single_crochet increase 3 single_crochet increase 15 nxt= next round 7 2 single_crochet increase 5x 20 single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch insert eyes two stitches to either side of the small horn st = stitch these are the sts the increase in round 5 were worked into yo = yarn over stuff snout #x = repeat contents of brackets # times round 8 13 single_crochet leg 3 single_crochet leg 2 single_crochet 20 rounds 9-11 single_crochet in each st around 20 round 12 14 single_crochet leg 3 single_crochet leg single_crochet 20 special stitches big horn chain 4 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook half_double_crochet round 13 2 single_crochet decrease 5x 15 in nxt 2 chs do not work into horn on round 14 single_crochet in each st around 15 next round round 15 single_crochet decrease 5x 10 ear chain 2 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook chain 1 slip_stitch stuff in top of single_crochet just made single_crochet in same chain as 1st round 16 5 decrease 5 single_crochet do not work into ear on next round tail chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch in nxt chain single_crochet in nxt leg work 5 double_crochet in same st omitting last yo chain and draw through of each yo draw cut yarn thread yarn tail through a stitch in round 16 so through all 6 lps on hook rhino tail hangs down finish off small horn chain 3 single_crochet in 2nd st from hook if the horns are curving forward pinch the vertical edges half_double_crochet in nxt chain do not work into horn on and push the bunched-up sts in the middle out toward next round the front the excess will pop out and cause the horn to curve backwards and into more of a tube no-sew rhinoceros ©2016 primarily patterns 2
